snippet: The Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development reports that the average tax on wage income is climbing in many countries.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off the Charts column; Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development releases its estimate of total tax 'wedge;' reports that average tax on wage income is climbing in majority of countries.
lead_paragraph: The Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development reports that the average tax on wage income is climbing in many countries.

headline.print_headline: Total Taxes on Wages Are Rising
headline.main: Total Taxes on Wages Are Rising
